title: Apply for grant of revised permission under the new regulations, if the project is on-going and the occupation certificate has not been granted fully
clause_text: Apply for grant of revised permission under the new regulations, if the project is on-going and the occupation certificate has not been granted fully. In such cases, charges/premium etc. paid earlier (1) against the FSI sanctioned / exemptions granted in side margins, allowing Residential / Commercial use on the Industrial Zone as per erstwhile regulations shall be deemed to have been paid against such earlier sanctioned FSI / exemptions / allowance of use. (3) In such cases (1) the charges / premium under these (1) regulations shall be leviable (2) against the revised permission and the charges / premium paid earlier shall be adjusted against the revised charges / premium under these regulations. Provided that no refund is permissible in any case.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Apply for grant of revised permission under the new regulations, if the project is on-going and the occupation certificate has not been granted fully. In such cases, charges/premium etc. paid earlier
